short.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G: Blocks specific words to combat bullying, racism, misogyny, and homophobia, protecting diversity, equity and inclusion.

long.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G: The internet is full of interesting things, but it can also be a place where unjustified hatred abounds. To help you improve your online experience, WordBlocker has arrived—a browser extension designed to censor content you prefer to avoid. Simply enter the words you don’t want to see, and WordBlocker will block them, preventing you from having to read unpleasant messages.
